title: Riot's website
body: Hey so I wanted to check up on my account and see how much money I have spent on Riot Points, I found Privacy.riotgames.com and everyone says it is legit and I can trust it, but I cannot even get to the login screen. It keeps saying 502 Bad Gateway. Plus when I click on login the link at the top in the address bar gets really long and seems to go on forever with a bunch on random stuff. Anyone know what is going on? I have tried this on several browsers. {{item:3632}}

replies.body: It sounds like your browser or some extension on it might be causing problems.  I recommend clearing your [cache ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)for a clean site, or even Incognito.  You can also try another browser to see if that fixes this up.  I hope that helps!
